channel.title: Tools on Kevin Darlington
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Kevin Darlington

item.title: Don't buy cheap USB to RS232 converters
item.description: So, my girlfriend bought me a STM32F103 board to play around with that has a RS-232 serial port on it to program it. Since I haven’t owned any computer in the last few years that has a serial port, I needed to get a converter.

item.title: High performance DIY fume extractor
item.description: Lately, I’ve been inhaling a little too much flux fumes so I decided that I needed a fume extractor. I saw a lot of DIY fume extractors on the web but I wasn’t satisfied with the performance of those extractors. A lot of the demonstrations showed that you had to be within 2 inches of the fan in order for it to work properly.
